price: 45 Mais Moïse jeta à son tour son bâton qui se mit à engloutir leurs artifices.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā mūsā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya talqafu mā yafikūna
